ing.item: Ginger ale; each 12 oz/355 l Ice cubes

directions.step:
"An all-occasion beverage - fruity & effervescent. Make sure juices and ginger ale are well chilled at the start."
In large pitcher or punch bowl combine apple, orange, grapefruit and lime juices. Just before serving, pour in ginger ale. Serve over ice cubes in tall glasses. MAKES: 8-10 SERVINGS SOURCE: _The Dave Nichol Cookbook_
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
